36 """
37 Prints summary of aggregated test results to stdout. This is useful
38 when running several tests across a package.
39 """
40 
41 from __future__ import print_function
42 
43 import sys
44 try:
45  from cStringIO import StringIO
46 except ImportError:
47  from io import StringIO
48 
49 import rospkg
50 
51 import rosunit.junitxml as junitxml
52 
53 
54 def create_summary(result, packages):
55  buff = StringIO()
56 
57  buff.write('-' * 80 + '\n')
58  buff.write('\033[1m[AGGREGATED TEST RESULTS SUMMARY]\033[0m\n\n')
59 
60  errors_failures = [r for r in result.test_case_results if r.errors or r.failures]
61  if errors_failures:
62  buff.write('ERRORS/FAILURES:\n')
63  for tc_result in errors_failures:
64  buff.write(tc_result.description)
65 
66  buff.write('PACKAGES: \n%s\n\n' % '\n'.join([' * %s' % p for p in packages]))
67 
68  buff.write('\nSUMMARY\n')
69  if (result.num_errors + result.num_failures) == 0:
70  buff.write('\033[32m * RESULT: SUCCESS\033[0m\n')
71  else:
72  buff.write('\033[1;31m * RESULT: FAIL\033[0m\n')
73 
74  # TODO: still some issues with the numbers adding up if tests fail to launch
75 
76  # number of errors from the inner tests, plus add in count for tests
77  # that didn't run properly ('result' object).
78  buff.write(' * TESTS: %s\n' % result.num_tests)
79  if result.num_errors:
80  buff.write('\033[1;31m * ERRORS: %s\033[0m\n' % result.num_errors)
81  else:
82  buff.write(' * ERRORS: 0\n')
83  if result.num_failures:
84  buff.write('\033[1;31m * FAILURES: %s\033[0m\n' % result.num_failures)
85  else:
86  buff.write(' * FAILURES: 0\n')
87  return buff.getvalue()
88 
89 
90 def main():
91  from optparse import OptionParser
92  parser = OptionParser(usage='usage: summarize_results.py [options] package')
93  parser.add_option('--nodeps',
94  dest='no_deps', default=False,
95  action='store_true',
96  help="don't compute test results for the specified package only")
97  (options, args) = parser.parse_args()
98  if len(args) != 1:
99  parser.error('Only one package may be specified')
100 
101  package = args[0]
102  r = rospkg.RosPack()
103  if options.no_deps:
104  packages = [package]
105  else:
106  packages = [package] + r.get_depends_on(package, implicit=True)
107  packages = [p for p in packages if p]
108 
109  result = junitxml.read_all(packages)
110  print(create_summary(result, packages))
111  if result.num_errors or result.num_failures:
112  sys.exit(1)
113 
114 
115 if __name__ == '__main__':
116  main()

def main()

def create_summary(result, packages)
